name: Arcade-game
body:
### Welcome to Classic Arcade Game.

          In this game you have a Player and Enemies (Bugs). The goal of the player is to reach the water,
          without colliding into any one of the enemies. The player can move left, right, up and down.
          The enemies move in varying speeds on the paved block portion of the scene.
          Once a the player collides with an enemy, the game is reset and the player moves back to the start square.
          Once the player reaches the water the game is won.




          ### How to Play?
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use.
          In this game you have a Player and Enemies (Bugs). The goal of the player is to reach the water,
          without colliding into any one of the enemies. The player can move left, right, up and down.
          The enemies move in varying speeds on the paved block portion of the scene. Once a the player collides with an enemy, the game is reset and the player moves back to the start square.
          Once the player reaches the water the game is won.



          ### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
